mapper.sql: doc_num, doc_title, doc_author, ver_num, doc_state, doc_release_date, doc_check_person, doc_content
mapper.select:
select
from tb_document order by doc_num

select
from tb_document p
and p.doc_title like concat('%', #{searchDocTitle}, '%')
order by doc_num
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_document
doc_num,
doc_title,
doc_author,
ver_num,
doc_state,
doc_release_date,
doc_check_person,
doc_content,

mapper.update:
update tb_document
doc_title = #{docTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doc_author = #{docAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ver_num = #{verNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doc_state = #{docState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doc_release_date = #{docReleaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
doc_check_person = #{docCheckPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doc_content = #{docContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where doc_num = #{docNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_document set doc_title = #{docTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_author = #{docAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ver_num = #{verNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_state = #{docState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_release_date = #{docReleaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, doc_check_person = #{docCheckPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_content = #{docContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where doc_num = #{docNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
